name: HealthMeter
0:
”Alexa, Open Health Meter”
”Alexa, Ask Health Meter to calculate BMI”
”Alexa, Tell Health Meter to calculate Body Mass Index”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: health meter
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using Heath Meter skill, you can monitor your health and calculate Body Mass Index (BMI). This skill helps you in taking the first step in staying fit and healthy with all the motivation.
Enable the Heath Meter skill on your Alexa Device just by saying, "Enable Health Meter"

Start using the Health Meter skill by saying any of the following,
"Alexa, Open Health Meter"
"Alexa, Ask Health Meter to calculate BMI"
"Alexa, Tell Health Meter that my height is 170 centimeters and weight is 67 kilograms"

Disclaimer: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
